channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russia Bombards Ukraine Hours After Zelensky Calls Peace Plan ‘Quite Solid’
item.description: The Ukrainian leader cited progress on security guarantees, even as Russia bombed Ukraine overnight, indicating that it is prepared to continue fighti...

item.title: New Jersey Honors Bomb-Sniffing Dogs Who Kept an Election Safe
item.description: For their heroics after a wave of bomb threats in New Jersey on Election Day, more than two dozen dogs were presented with an award from the state att...

item.title: American journalist injured in Israeli attack wants answers from Washington
item.description: AFP's Dylan Collins was among journalists injured in an Israeli attack on Lebanon in 2023. The attack killed Reuters' Issam Abdallah. Collins was in W...

item.title: YouTube Has a Firm Grip on Daytime TV
item.description: YouTube’s big streaming lead over Netflix and other competitors stems in large part to its dominance during daylight hours.

item.title: The Strange Case of the Russian Snickers in U.K. Convenience Shops
item.description: The Russian-labeled candy bars are a reminder of how difficult it is to completely disconnect a major economy from the global flow of goods.

item.title: U.S. regulators approve Wegovy pill for weight loss

item.title: Immigrants now have fewer legal options to stay in U.S. under Trump
item.description: The 1.6 million number marks the largest-ever effort to strip permissions for immigrants who attempted to migrate to the country through legal means, ...

item.title: Trump May Give SpaceX Some Land In A Texas Wildlife Refuge
item.description: In exchange for the land in Texas, the rocket and satellite company would give the government some of its own property nearby, documents show.

item.title: Federal student loans are changing. Here's what to expect in 2026
item.description: The SAVE Plan is ending and repayment options will change dramatically in the new year.

item.title: Biden stopped the executions of 37 men. Trump's DOJ wants to punish them

item.description: The Russian-labeled candy bars are a reminder of how difficult it is to completely disconnect a major economy from the global flow of goods.

item.title: German Leaders, Undercutting the Far Right, Are Leaning on the Far Left

item.title: Businesses in Canada Navigate Trump’s Tariffs During the Busy Holiday Season
item.description: Small businesses across Canada have lost out on sales because of the trade war, and many worry about their future.
